    right="Feat 1"

>
[Steady on Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=2569) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to the earth makes natural uneven surfaces less of a hindrance for you. You can ignore difficult terrain caused by rubble and uneven ground made of stone and earth. In addition, when you use the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) skill to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of stone and earth, you aren't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), and when you roll a success at one of these Acrobatics checks, you get a critical success instead.
name: Steady on Stone
